titleStmt.title: To the Kings most Excellent Maiesty the hvmble desires of the commissioners of His Majesties kingdome of Scotland : as also the names of the said commissioners : with an order of the House of Commons testifying their loving acceptance, and thankfulnesse for their brotherly care of the publique welfare.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament.

titleStmt.title: To the Kings most Excellent Maiesty the hvmble desires of the commissioners of His Majesties kingdome of Scotland : as also the names of the said commissioners : with an order of the House of Commons testifying their loving acceptance, and thankfulnesse for their brotherly care of the publique welfare.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament.
Lothian, William Kerr, Earl of, 1605?-1675.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Signed: Earle Lothian. Earle Lindsay. Lord Balmerio. Sir Thomas Morton. Sir Thomas Hope. Sir Archibauld Johnston Burgesses. Sir Iohn Smith. Master Robert Barklay. Master Patrick Bell.
The "order of the House of Commons" is dated Jan. 17, 1641 [/42]
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
